attributes.action: For Nicola Sturgeon to use the Scottish right to vetoe the uk's exit from the EU
attributes.background: For Nicola Sturgeon to listen to the pro EU UK citizens and act in the best interest of the UK, in light of recent misconceptions of the brexit campaign coming to light.

rejection.details:
The Scottish Parliament has its own Public Petitions Committee. If you'd like to send your petition to the Scottish Parliament, you can find out more here:

http://www.scottish.parliament.uk/gettinginvolved/petitions/index.aspx
